backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing authorization, user profiles, and an enquiry system with submission, admin retrieval, deletion, and pagination.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to file paths, components, and test IDs for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend file roles including layout, sections, hooks, admin components, and styling setup.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, radius, and dark/light theme variables with global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for home and admin pages with layout and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/EnquiriesL: Admin list component showing enquiries with timestamps, details, delete dialog, and loading/error states.
Wrapper enforcing Internet Identity authentication and admin checks, showing loading, login prompt, or access denied.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrated with Internet Identity, handling status, errors, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/enquiry/EnquiryF: A form component that validates enquiry input fields and submits data using a custom hook, showing success or error alerts accordingly.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with branding, quick-scroll links, social icons, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays a sticky header with logo navigation, smooth-scroll menu items, and a mobile collapsible menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Shows an about section highlighting key features of the tuition centre using icon cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/Classes: Lists class groups with descriptions and subjects offered, displayed in styled cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/Enquiry: Wraps and presents the enquiry form within a styled section with heading text.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with title, description, calls to action, and a decorative hero image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Teachin: Outlines the teaching approach through a list of methods and an accompanying illustrative image.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnquiriesAdmin.ts: Provides admin enquiry queries and mutations using the actor, including fetching, deleting, checking admin status, and counting enquiries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context/provider handling login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitEnquiry.ts: Defines a mutation to submit a new enquiry via the actor and invalidates the enquiries list on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for themes, and typography using imported fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminEnquiriesPage.ts: Admin page showing enquiry management UI with navigation and authentication guard.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page assembling main marketing sections like hero, about, classes, and enquiry form.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, implemented features, pending requests, and image requirements for the Orion Star Tuition Centre website.
